AltName.entry: NATIONAL SOCIETY FOR THE PREVENTION OF CRUELTY TO CHILDREN

Desc.entry: City centre resource for young people aged 9-18 years (24 years if a care leaver). Provides counselling, a children's rights and advocacy service and an independent visiting service for Looked After Children. Also provides other opportunities for young people to participate in activities and group work, on a rolling programme. Encourages self referrals, but will accept assisted referral if the young person attends the centre with a professional. A registered national charity.

ContactName.entry: Permala Sehmar/Trish Cousins, Children's Services Managers

category.entry: CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLE - ADVICE AND INFORMATION
